name: Jorge
description: Employee at brewability with intellectual and developmental disabilities
aiEnhancedDetails: Jorge is a male individual with a heavy build. He is bald on top of his head, with short, dark hair visible on the sides and back. He has a thick, dark, and graying mustache on his upper lip. His face is broad with full cheeks, dark, thick eyebrows, and deep-set, dark-colored eyes. He has a broad nose with a rounded tip. His skin tone is medium-dark. Visible facial wrinkles are present around his eyes and forehead, and he has a full chin with visible neck folds. When smiling, he reveals a full set of generally straight, white teeth with some visible spacing in the lower front. His arms appear thick and substantial, with visible hair follicles. On the ring finger of his right hand, he wears a gold-colored signet ring with a light-colored, possibly white or clear, stone. He is wearing a dark (appearing black) short-sleeved t-shirt, to which a white badge featuring a yellow circular smiling emoji is clipped.
